channel.title: Free Dedicated server with 2GB RAM!
channel.description:
Step 1) Go Here: https://www.budgetdedicated.com/virtualdedicatedpricecalculator.php [b](BETTER LINK THANKS TO COONHUNTER!)[/b] Step 2) Put everything to the maximum. Step 3) Press the try server button. Step 4) Make All the details bullshit except your e-mail. (i used http://www.fakenamegenerator.com/) Step 5) You will receive your server details in your e-mail! Notes: -It takes a few try's to actually find out what works best to get the servers. -This can be done every 7 days, forever!
Enjoy you free VPs forever lol
PLEASE COMMENT

item.title: Free Dedicated server with 2GB RAM!
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

[quote=“ManzpkScape, post:16, topic:356863”][quote author=asyo4 link=topic=453394.msg3321133#msg3321133 date=1282707070]

[quote author=ManzpkScape link=topic=453394.msg3321132#msg3321132 date=1282706978]

asyo4 - You do realize how rare this is right? Most area’s want your information first, and THEN give you a free 7 days before charging. That is, if they even give a trial. Even if you only have this up for 7 days, it can do good if your changing hoster’s for your server, as you can put it on there really quick, and start transferring to the other persons computer and getting it setup.

why would it matter if you would fill in your info first? i wouldnt classify that as “rare”
[/quote]He means your credit card info

o
[/quote]He is just saying that with most, you cant even have the trial without a valid credit card number[/quote]
yeah i understand what you’re getting at - i thought he meant info as in emails and such

Read full topic

-This can be done every 7 days, forever!
